name.ja: メンタル・チューナー

text.en:
You can activate 1 of these effects. You can only use this effect of "Mind Tuner" once per turn.
● Banish up to 2 monsters from your hand and/or GY (1 LIGHT and 1 DARK); increase or decrease this card's Level by the number banished, until the end of this turn.
● Target up to 2 of your banished monsters (1 LIGHT and 1 DARK); return them to the GY, and if you do, increase or decrease this card's Level by the number returned, until the end of this turn.
